body_html:
I'm using the latest pip3 version which has the BFC allocator. actually, bfc_allocator is the one outputting all of that log.

It's most likely a memory leak or a similar scenario. I'm using a GPU with 12G of ram and the models (as it can be seen in referenced paper) are quite tiny.

Please let me know if I can provide any other info to track down the issue.
